pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Comparative Tools for Fitting Evolutionary Models to Morphometric Data // Fits multivariate (Brownian Motion, Early Burst, ACDC, Ornstein-Uhlenbeck and Shifts) models of continuous traits evolution on trees and time series. 'mvMORPH' also proposes high-dimensional multivariate comparative tools (linear models using Generalized Least Squares and multivariate tests) based on penalized likelihood. See Clavel et al. (2015) DOI:10.1111/2041-210X.12420, Clavel et al. (2019) DOI:10.1093/sysbio/syy045, and Clavel Morlon (2020) DOI:10.1093/sysbio/syaa010.
